elements.content:
Table 1 Crystal data and structure refinement details for compounds 1–3
Compound 1 2 3
a R 1 = ∑||Fo| − |Fc||/∑|Fo|. b wR 2 = |∑w(|Fo|2 − |Fc|2)|/∑|w(Fo)2|1/2, where w = 1/[σ2(Fo2) + (aP)2 + bP]; P = (Fo2 + 2Fc2)/3.
Empirical formula C30H56N20O23Ca2Cl4 C44H68N20O29 C37H68N20O29CaCl2
Formula weight 1286.91 1341.18 1368.09
Crystal system Monoclinic Orthorhombic Hexagonal
Space group C 2/c P 21 21 2 P 65
a/Å 32.7209(15) 15.8841(18) 14.7327(18)
b/Å 19.4444(9) 12.4803(14) 14.7327(18)
c/Å 32.739(2) 14.1747(16) 46.389(11)
β/° 115.904(2) 90.00 90.00
V/Å3 18737.2(18) 2810.0(5) 8720(3)
Z 16 2 6
D c/g cm−3 1.515 1.585 1.563
T/K 173 223 173
μ/mm−1 0.547 0.134 0.306
Unique reflect. 16474 4965 10098
Obs. reflect. 5345 4628 8730
R int 0.0802 0.0233 0.0485
R 1 [I > 2σ(I)]a 0.1015 0.0466 0.0762
wR 2 [I > 2σ(I)]b 0.2565 0.1282 0.2124
R (all data) 0.1753 0.0496 0.0825
wR (all data) 0.2591 0.1303 0.2189
GOF on F2 1.097 1.080 1.032
Fig. 1 (a) A linear supramolecular chain constructed from Q[5]–Ca2+ molecular capsules linked by additional Ca–Ocarbonyl bonds; (b) view of the Q[5]–Ca2+ molecular capsules.
